About this item                   Intel Core i7-1260P Processor with vPro (E-Core Max 3.40 GHz, P-Core Max 4.70 GHz with Turbo Boost, 12 Cores, 16 Threads, 18 MB Cache); 32GB LPDDR5-5200MHz RAM, 1TB PCIe SSD. Super long battery life, up to 13 hours. Razor thin body, just 0.60”; It weighs 2.48 pounds, ultralight design.     14" WUXGA (1920 x 1200), IPS, Anti-Glare, 100% sRGB, 400 nits, 16:10, LED Backlight, Narrow Bezel, Low Power, Touch display; 1080p FHD RGB with webcam privacy shutter; Integrated Intel Iris Xe Graphics; Supports external digital monitor via HDMI, Thunderbolt 4, Max external digital monitor resolution: 4K(3840x2160) @60Hz.     2 x Thunderbolt 4 with Power Delivery and DisplayPort (USB4 Type-C), 2 x USB-A 3.2 Gen 1, HDMI 2.0, Headphone / mic combo, Kensington lock slot; Intel Wi-Fi 6E AX 201; Bluetooth 5.1; Backlit Keyboard; Fingerprint Reader.     Windows 11 Pro 64-bit, Ideal for School Education, Designers, Professionals, Small Business, Programmers, Casual Gaming, Streaming, Online Class, Remote Learning, Zoom Meeting, Video Conference, etc.     Brand New Computer has been resealed to upgrade the Memory or SSD. Three-year warranty from the manufacturer. Three-year warranty for upgraded Memory/SSD for Issaquah Highlands Tech customers.

Keeps cool under pressure The underside of the keys on our legendary ThinkPad keyboard has been redesigned for air intake to create better airflow. Combined with the dual fan and rear venting, the ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 10 laptop delivers improved thermals—so go ahead and put in long hours working and playing as this X1 will stay as cool as you are. Security as unique as your DNA Biometrics provides extra security on the ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 10 laptop—from the power button integrated with the fingerprint reader that lets you log in and boot up instantaneously to the facial recognition software that works with the optional IR camera. Plus, Computer Vision-based presence detection automatically locks your device when you move away, and with the optional PrivacyGuard display, no wandering eyes see what’s on your screen.Technical SpecificationsDisplay: 14 inch, WUXGA (1920 x 1200), IPS, 400nits, low-power, 16:10, narrow bezels, Touch DisplayProcessor: 12th Generation Intel Core i7-1260P vPro Processor (E-Core Max 3.40 GHz, P-Core Max 4.70 GHz with Turbo Boost, 12 Cores, 16 Threads, 18 MB Cache)Graphics: Integrated Intel Iris Xe GraphicsMemory: 32GB LPDDR5 RAMStorage: 1TB NVMe PCIe M.2 SSDNetworking: Wi-Fi 6E (802.11ax) + Bluetooth 5.1Operating System: Windows 11 Pro 64-bitBattery: Up to 13 hours 57Whr (MM18)Camera: 1080p FHD RGB with webcam privacy shutterKeyboard: Blacklit - US EnglishSecurity: Discrete Trusted Platform Module (dTPM) 2.0, Finferprint ReaderDimensions: 0.60" x 12.43" x 8.76" Weight: 2.48 lbsI/O Ports2 x USB 4 Type-C with Thunderbolt 4 (DisplayPort / Data Transfer / Power Delivery)2 x USB-A 3.2 Gen 11 x HDMI 2.01 x Headphone / mic combo1 x Kensington lock slot

To calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we don’t use a simple average. Instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on Amazon. It also analyses reviews to verify trustworthiness.

5.0 out of 5 stars







  
  
    Super fast laptop
Shipping was FAST. Said Tuesday and came Saturday and saved me! I was in a bind and this seller made my day. Works great, very light, quickbooks is a breeze to install. Thanks!

    Great laptop, as advertised
This is a great laptop with high specs. I needed to contact customer service about a warranty issue and they were very responsive. Would buy from the seller again.
